thread.title: Kanye throws Kim a surprise birthday party - where guests wear baby bumps
thread.title_full: Kanye throws Kim a surprise birthday party - where guests wear baby bumps

title: Kanye throws Kim a surprise birthday party - where guests wear baby bumps
text:
Kanye throws Kim a surprise birthday party - where guests wear baby bumps Kanye throws Kim a surprise birthday party - where guests wear baby bumps 
  
Pregnant reality star Kim Kardashian has been treated to a touching – if slightly unusual – birthday surprise by husband Kanye West. 
The rapper organised a party where all the guests were asked to wear fake baby bumps. 
Kim, who is due to give birth to their second child in December, celebrated turning 35 with all her nearest and dearest in attendance. Kanye West and Kim Kardashian (Nina Prommer/AP) 
According to the Daily Mirror, guests were required to come dressed in their best “pregnant Kim” look, with fake baby bumps handed out on arrival. 
Kayne, 38, rented a screen at a movie theatre in Los Angeles for his wife and her guests to watch the new Steve Jobs movie. 
Sister Kourtney later shared a snap of her, Kris, Kylie and make-up artist Joyce Bonelli wearing their bumps. 
She joked: “I wasn’t expecting to look this way again quite yet, but Happy Pregnant Birthday @kimkardashian !!” 
Kim shared a picture of a huge bunch of flowers and a cake which read: “Happy pregnant birthday Kim.” 
She captioned it: “My husband never ceases to amaze me!” 
She continued: “He rented out the entire movie theatre to screen the new Steve Jobs (It’s s good BTW) and had all of my family & close friends come dressed up as their best pregnant Kim look (fake baby bumps provided on arrival!). Share article 
“Not sure if that was to make me feel less huge or just a fun cool theme but I loved it & had the best time ever, feeling so very comfortable eating churros with a bunch of pregnant women! Just what I needed, the perfect chill yummy food birthday!!!!” Promoted Stories
